title: SaNmukhapriya nAyakan
sahitya:
(rAgA:  SaNmukhapriyA)  
  SaNmukhapriya nAyakan murugan
(rAgA:  shankarAbharaNa)
shankarAbharaNan sayanan marugan
(rAgA:  bhairavi)


anupallavi

 taNmukha bhairavi tandaruL bAlan
(rAg  mOhana)
tani ezhil mOhanan tavazh mukha vElan
(rAg  shahAnA)


caraNam    anbariDam sahAnAn ena varuvAn
aruL sAramatiyuDan ATralum taruvAn
in pantuvarALiyAi iDam ellAm aLippAn
iyal isai darbAril inidamarndu iruppAn
